name: 7 Grand Steps: What Ancients Begat
summary: What Ancients Begat is a complete (~15 hour) game of family generations surviving the rise of western civilization. Survival is the ultimate goal. The sub-goals, you choose, build their story.Experience an abstract telling of the lives of our earliest recorded ancestors.
info:
• 别名: 7 Grand Steps
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 策略
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2013年6月8日
  • 开发: Mousechief
  • 发行: Mousechief
